categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Flame was a male Gen'Dai resistance leader active on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. The Flame had a personal vendetta against the Sith Empire for destroying the Gen'Dai homeworld.
The Flame can be killed in battle against an Imperial character for dark side points, or spared and go into exile with his followers for light side points.
